title: Manuscript Workshop Critique
flavor: A small group tears into your pages—lovingly, but with opinions.
choiceA_label: Pay for the full critique package

title: Query Letter Bootcamp
flavor: You learn how to pitch your story in one page without sounding like a raccoon selling treasure.

title: Copyediting Deep Dive
flavor: You spend an evening making friends with punctuation and enemies with your ego.
choiceA_label: Pay for a pro editor walkthrough
choiceB_label: Grab the style guide and practice

title: Figure Drawing Marathon
flavor: Three hours, one model, and a thousand humbling gestures.
choiceB_label: Bring scraps + take a corner spot

title: Color Theory Clinic
flavor: You finally understand why your shadows keep turning into mud.
choiceA_label: Take the full clinic + materials kit

title: Portfolio Scanning & Print Prep
flavor: You learn how to photograph, scan, and present work so it looks like you meant it.

title: Studio Session with an Engineer
flavor: A real audio engineer points out problems you can’t un-hear.
choiceB_label: Pay for a quick mix notes pass

title: Ear-Training App Streak
flavor: You grind intervals until your brain starts naming notes in its sleep.
choiceA_label: Upgrade the app + do the hard mode

title: Rehearsal Space Rental
flavor: You rent a tiny room that smells like amps and ambition.
choiceA_label: Split the room with a bandmate

title: Scene Study Workshop
flavor: You work scenes with strangers who are way too good at crying on command.

title: Headshot & Reel Day
flavor: Lighting, wardrobe, a camera—and the terrifying thought that your face is your résumé.

title: Dialect Coach Mini-Unit
flavor: You learn a new accent and immediately start hearing everyone else’s mistakes.

title: Choreography Lab
flavor: A choreographer pushes you to make choices—big, bold, and specific.

title: Strength & Mobility Trainer
flavor: You pay for form corrections that make everything feel harder… and safer.

title: Audition Tape Setup
flavor: You learn how to light, frame, and record movement so it reads on camera.
choiceB_label: Borrow gear and keep it simple

title: Lens & Lighting Rental Day
flavor: You finally shoot with real glass and realize why people get obsessed.
choiceA_label: Rent the good kit + test shots
choiceB_label: Rent a basic kit for an hour

title: Edit Suite Crash Course
flavor: Shortcuts, timelines, and the dark art of making bad footage look intentional.

title: Festival Strategy Consult
flavor: You get brutally practical advice on where your film actually belongs.
choiceA_label: Pay for a portfolio review + plan
